name: Call of Duty®: Black Ops II - Coyote Personalization Pack
detailed_description: Inspired by the arid terrain of the American Southwest, the Call of Duty®: Black Ops II Coyote Personalization Pack comes loaded with a desert-themed weapon skin, three uniquely-shaped reticles, and an all-new Calling Card. (NOTICE: Reticles only available on select scopes.)
about_the_game: Inspired by the arid terrain of the American Southwest, the Call of Duty®: Black Ops II Coyote Personalization Pack comes loaded with a desert-themed weapon skin, three uniquely-shaped reticles, and an all-new Calling Card. (NOTICE: Reticles only available on select scopes.)
short_description: Inspired by the arid terrain of the American Southwest, the Call of Duty®: Black Ops II Coyote Personalization Pack comes loaded with a desert-themed weapon skin, three uniquely-shaped reticles, and an all-new Calling Card. (NOTICE: Reticles only available on select scopes.)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista® SP2/Windows® 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8200 2.66 GHz or AMD Phenom X3 8750 2.4 GHz processor or better
  • Memory: 2GB RAM for 32-bit OS or 4GB for 64-bit OS GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 3870 512MB or Nvidia Geforce 8800 GT 512MB or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX® 9.0C or later
